g.text: Fetch N+1 entities but only add the first N entities to the display list.
1. The idea is to check if the (N+1) th entity exists.
2. If the (N+1) th entity doesn't exist we can be sure there are no more entities to fetch --> hide the "Fetch More" button
3. If the (N+1) th entity exists we need to show the "Fetch More" button and request again.
Example: entities to display = 2 (N); entities to fetch = 3 (N+1)
Case 1: Result set contains 2 (or less than two) entities. Since there's no 3rd or (N+1) th entity we stop and don't show the "Fetch More" button
Case 2: Result set contains 3 entities. Since there's a 3rd or (N+1) th entity we show the "Fetch More" button but we only
Now, since we have enabled the "Fetch More" button, lets make the next query to fetch the next page of entitties
If E5 is the last entity, then we will still request the next page but we'd get back only E5
Finally, we show the last entity E5 and disable/hide the "Fetch More" button
